ygData.subject: Re: Piercing or blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Work on all of them is what I suggest. There are some nice weapons for wizards in piercing, 1HB and 2HB . Just check around the weapons section on
ygData.messageBody:
Work on all of them is what I suggest. There are some nice weapons for
wizards in piercing, 1HB and 2HB . Just check around the weapons section on
http://www.gameznet.com/eq/ and you will see that there are tradeoffs for
all skills.. I wish I had folowed my own advice and I am now trying to riase
my 1HB and my percing at lvl 23..

Also, I know alot of lvl 29-30+ wizards that dont even use weapons, they got
a rune tome or soemthing from najena that gives them some nice stat boosts
and sisnce they are never in meelee there is no real need for a weapon
-----Original Message-----
From: Marziani, Michael D. <Michael.Marziani@...>
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 5:24 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Piercing or blunt?


>From: "Marziani, Michael D." <Michael.Marziani@...>
>
>Hail fellow Wizards!
>
>I would like to inquire as to your preferences of melee weapon. I am a
>level 9 right now and am at the point where I am thinking about seeking a
>magical weapon. I am sure at higher levels I won't even want to get NEAR
>the monster I am fighting to melee, but at this point I can still get some
>decent damage and save mana finishing off creatures with melee.
>
>So as far as magic weapons go, what should I be setting my sights on and
>what choices do i have available in the next couple levels? Also, should I
>in general try to use daggers (for speed but low damage), 2h blunt (for
good
>damage but low speed), or 1h blunt (holding a nice magic item in offhand --
>like what?). As much or as little info as ye have I would be grateful.
>
>Thanks!
>
>-Solric
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Got an opinion?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
>
